title: When is Ranked 3's enabled? I thought only Ranked 5's was limited.
body: When is Ranked 3's enabled? I thought only Ranked 5's was limited.

replies.body: Ranked Teams for 3v3 and 5v5 are currently on a schedule, which varies depending on weekday or weekend.  Our [ranked team schedule](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209964886-Ranked-Teams-Schedule) guide provides the time periods in detail.  That should help clear things up!
Oh thanks! I wasn't aware 3's was put on a schedule too.
